accountSettings.title: Account
accountSettings.changedDescription: Your account information has been changed.

passwordSettings.title: Change password
passwordSettings.changedDescription: Your password has been changed. The next time you want to login, you have to use your new password.
passwordSettings.repeatNewPasswordMatchError: This field must match your new password field.
passwordSettings.errorInvalidOldPasswordMessage: Could not change your password because your old password is invalid.

error.alreadyExistsMessage: A user with the provided e-mail address already exists.
error.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid e-mail address.
error.disabledAccountMessage: This user account has been disabled.
error.incorrectCredentialMessage: The provided e-mail address or password is incorrect.

leaveGroupModal.title: Leave {group}
leaveGroupModal.message: Are you sure you want to leave the group {group}? You won't be able to access the related applications anymore and if you want to regain access, one of the admins must invite you again. If you leave the group, it will not be deleted. All the other members will still have access to it. It is not possible to leave a group if you're the last admin because that will leave it unmaintained.

groupMemberModal.userAlreadyInGroupTitle: User is already in the group.
groupMemberModal.userAlreadyInGroupText: It is not possible to send an invitation when the user is already a member of the group.

groupInviteForm.errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid e-mail address.

trashContents.message: Restore deleted items from the past {duration}
trashContents.empty: Nothing has been deleted in the past three days.

trashEmptyModal.titleIsTrashed: Are you sure you want to permanently delete {name}?
trashEmptyModal.titleIsNotTrashed: Are you sure you want to empty the trash of {name}?
trashEmptyModal.messageIsTrashed: This will permanently delete it and all of its contents. After which they cannot be recovered.
trashEmptyModal.messageIsNotTrashed: This will permanently delete the listed items. After which they cannot be recovered.

trashModal.emptyMessage: You aren't a member of any group. Applications like databases belong to a group, so in order to create them you need to create a group.

uploadFileUserFileUpload.title: Upload from my device
uploadFileUserFileUpload.clickOrDrop: Click or drop your files here

failedConnectingNotification.title: Failed
failedConnectingNotification.content: Connection to the server has failed. Please refresh the page.

errorLayout.notFound: The page you are looking for has not been found. This might be because URL is incorrect or that you don’t have permission to view this page.
errorLayout.error: Something went wrong while loading the page. Our developers have been notified of the issue. Please try to refresh or return to the dashboard.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.alertText: If you find Baserow useful then sponsoring, starring or sharing us is greatly appreciated. By sponsoring us on GitHub you will get early access to the premium features!
dashboard.tweetContent: Check out @baserow an open source no-code database tool and Airtable alternative!
dashboard.noGroupText: You aren’t a member of any group. Applications like databases belong to a group, so in order to create them you need to create a group.

resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.errorInvalidLinkMessage: Could not reset the password because the link is invalid.
resetPassword.errorLinkExpiredMessage: The password reset link has expired. Please request another one.

signup.title: Sign up
signup.disabledMessage: It's not possible to create an account because it has been disabled.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password
forgotPassword.message: Please enter your e-mail address in the form. If we find an account then we will send an e-mail with a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.confirmation: If your email address exists in our database, you will receive a password reset link at your email address in a few minutes.

settings.instanceIdDescription: The instance ID is the unique identifier of your Baserow copy.
settings.settingAllowNewAccountsDescription: By default, any user visiting your Baserow domain can sign up for a new account.
